text: I guess I thought we were talking about a regular HS form - I have not used the meeting scheduler yet and when I just tested it I don't think you can do anything but embed.  Another place you can go to get answers is the HS community pages.  Someone submitted an idea to that board a while back about this very thing.  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Need-ability-to-style-online-Schedule-Meeting-UI/idi-p/246281>

you can have your branding which is fine, I can embed but the embed keeps getting cut off so people sometimes don’t see required fields and our fear is that we’re missing on booked calls because we’re not able to show the entire form without them having to scroll in the iframe.
